sentences.sContent: More exercises can avoid atrophy of cartilage.
sentences.sContent_eng: More exercises can avoid atrophy of cartilage.
sentences.sCn: 多加锻炼可以避免软骨萎缩。

sentences.sContent: If you don't exercise your muscles, they weaken and atrophy.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you don't exercise your muscles, they weaken and atrophy.
sentences.sCn: 如果不锻炼你的肌肉，肌力就削弱和萎缩了。

sentences.sContent: Some areas of the brain, if not stimulated, will atrophy and die.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some areas of the brain, if not stimulated, will atrophy and die.
sentences.sCn: 大脑的某些区域如果没有受到促进就会萎缩更甚死亡。

remMethod.val: a(无) + troph(营养) + y → 无营养会萎缩 → 萎缩

words.tran: 萎缩（atrophy的过去分词）；使衰退
